name: Tofoon
startIntroPart1: May our ɡod's blessinɡ be upon you, Tcawfā Cwa Ĉiawhwa, Emperor of our eternal nation of Tofoon!
startIntroPart2: My Emperor, can you make Tofoon prevail again, using your divine intelligence? Tofoon stands for greatness, and all its enemies will be dazzled soon enough! Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: Well, we hope you know what you are doing.
defeated: Our people shall forever remember this day.
introduction: Greetings, I am Ghwa Ciawhwa, Emperor of all of Tofoon. Extend our warm welcome to you.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
